domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @MattHancock We need to be careful we are not rushing through unsafe vaccines in order to rid the world of  COVID19. We could end up killing millions. More questions to be asked at future enquiries into how this was handled. Would those promoting a rushed vaccine give it to their own family ?
